title: CLI and RPC
description: In this chapter, the reader will learn how to install the official "tezos-client" and "tezos-admin-client" applications and run them with the Command Line Interface. These commands call remote procedures of a Tezos node (local or remote). There are many commands, but we'll see some examples.

frontMatter.title: CLI and RPC
frontMatter.authors: Thomas Zoughebi, Aymeric Bethencourt, and Maxime Fernandez
